Order My Meals

Instructions to Submit Meal Requests
  1. Place your meal order for Lunch and Dinner on the same day before 8.00 A.M.
  2. Place your meal order for Breakfast before 3.30 P.M. of the previous day.

    3. E.g. If you wish to order breakfast for friday, your order should be pasted on Thursday before 3.30 P.M.
